meanings.definition: Opposed to or against rock music.
meanings.sent1: She refused to listen to the antirock radio station.
meanings.sent2: The antirock movement gained popularity among young people.
meanings.sent3: His antirock attitude made him stand out at the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her antirock beliefs were as solid as a stone wall.
meanings.sent5: The antirock protest was peaceful but powerful.

meanings.definition: A device used to prevent a vehicle from rolling backwards on a steep incline.
meanings.sent1: The antirock kept the car steady on the hill.
meanings.sent2: He always carries an antirock in his trunk for safety.
meanings.sent3: The antirock saved the day when the brakes failed.
meanings.sent4: The antirock was a lifesaver on the mountain road.
meanings.sent5: Using the antirock prevented any accidents on the slope.

meanings.definition: A person who is against the use of rocks in landscaping or construction.
meanings.sent1: The antirock argued for alternative materials in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She hired an antirock to design her rock-free backyard.
meanings.sent3: The antirock made everyone laugh by suggesting a sandcastle instead.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the antirock in the stone mason community.
meanings.sent5: The antirock's creativity in avoiding rocks was impressive.
